Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":72514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これはいったい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  \"What on earth is this...?\""},{"lineNumber":72515,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは室内で首輪をつけられ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel was collared inside the room,"},{"lineNumber":72516,"originalJapaneseLine":"柱に繋がれていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and tied to a pillar."},{"lineNumber":72517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やかましい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shut up!"},{"lineNumber":72518,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは勝手に死んだお前に対しての罰だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a punishment for you dying on your own accord!\""},{"lineNumber":72519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、勝手に死んだ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-dying on my own accord...?\""},{"lineNumber":72520,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、なんでもない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it's nothing.\""},{"lineNumber":72521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、でもこれじゃ、お茶も淹れられないです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, but this way, I can't even make tea.\""},{"lineNumber":72522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ、お茶ならビスケッタさんがいるだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, if it's tea, Biscetta is here, isn't she?\""},{"lineNumber":72523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル様が動けない間は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"While Lady Sheel can't move,"},{"lineNumber":72524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　代わりと言っては力不足ですが、私が……","translatedEnglishLine":"I may be insufficient as a substitute, but I will...\""},{"lineNumber":72525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィル様におかれましてはどうかお気になさらず","translatedEnglishLine":"Please, Lady Sheel, don't worry about it.\""},{"lineNumber":72526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってわけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's how it is."},{"lineNumber":72527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気にするな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't worry about it.\""},{"lineNumber":72528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「き、気にしますぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I will worry...\""},{"lineNumber":72529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":72530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、なんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, what?\""},{"lineNumber":72531,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どっか体の調子が悪いのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Is some part of your body unwell?"},{"lineNumber":72532,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、それとも寒いか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or are you cold?\""},{"lineNumber":72533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":72534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ……ただ、その、あの……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No... it's just, um, well...\""},{"lineNumber":72535,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、おトイレに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I need to go to the bathroom...\""},{"lineNumber":72536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我慢しろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hold it.\""},{"lineNumber":72537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":72538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「トイレに行く途中で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What if you fall on the way to the bathroom!?"},{"lineNumber":72539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　転んだらどうする気だ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"What will you do if you fall!?\""},{"lineNumber":72540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「転んだら……それは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I fall... well...\""},{"lineNumber":72541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立ち上がりますけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll get back up... but...\""},{"lineNumber":72542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、仕方ないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":72543,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ビスケッタさん、介添えでついていってくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta, escort her along.\""},{"lineNumber":72544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かしこまりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood."},{"lineNumber":72545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあシィル様。こちらに」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, Lady Sheel, this way.\""},{"lineNumber":72546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、え〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-ehhh...\""},{"lineNumber":72547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに……あれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's... that...?\""},{"lineNumber":72548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランスがシィルちゃんに優しい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"R-Rance being kind to Sheel-chan..."},{"lineNumber":72549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなの初めて見たわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've never seen anything like that before...\""},{"lineNumber":72550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正直、ちょっと怖い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, it's kind of scary...\""},{"lineNumber":72551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実は偽物のランスとか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe it's an impostor Rance or something?\""},{"lineNumber":72552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それ以外だと……もしかして……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Otherwise... could it be...\""},{"lineNumber":72553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルちゃん、妊娠した？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sheel-chan, are you pregnant?\""},{"lineNumber":72554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":72555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜、私にもサッパリなんです〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I have no idea either~\""},{"lineNumber":72556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":72557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふんっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":72558,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの過保護はその後しばらく続き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's overprotectiveness continued for a while thereafter,"},{"lineNumber":72559,"originalJapaneseLine":"城内の皆を大いに驚かせたという。","translatedEnglishLine":"greatly surprising everyone in the castle."},{"lineNumber":72560,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle—"},{"lineNumber":72561,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統司令部前――","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the Supreme Command Headquarters—"},{"lineNumber":72562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「準備はいいな、シィル」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you ready, Sheel?\""},{"lineNumber":72563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぉ、中に入らないのですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, aren't you going inside?\""},{"lineNumber":72564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だからお前は駄目なのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why you can't come."},{"lineNumber":72565,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はなんの日だ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What day is today?\""},{"lineNumber":72566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと、本格的に魔軍に対して","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, the day when we officially start counterattacking the demon army... right?\""},{"lineNumber":72567,"originalJapaneseLine":"　反撃を開始する日……ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The day we begin the counterattack... right?\""},{"lineNumber":72568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その通り。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right."},{"lineNumber":72569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は俺様が華々しく活躍するその初日だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Today is the first day I will shine brilliantly."},{"lineNumber":72570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初からバシーッと行くのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going to strike hard from the very start.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは室内で首輪をつけられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel was collared inside the room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは勝手に死んだお前に対しての罰だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a punishment for you dying on your own accord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、でもこれじゃ、お茶も淹れられないです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, but this way, I can't even make tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、お茶ならビスケッタさんがいるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, if it's tea, Biscetta is here, isn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 代わりと言っては力不足ですが、私が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I may be insufficient as a substitute, but I will..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル様におかれましてはどうかお気になさらず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, Lady Sheel, don't worry about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっか体の調子が悪いのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is some part of your body unwell?
I-I need to go to the bathroom..."
"What if you fall on the way to the bathroom!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転んだらどうする気だ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do if you fall!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさん、介添えでついていってくれ」
さあシィル様。こちらに」
「ら、ランスがシィルちゃんに優しい……
あんなの初めて見たわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen anything like that before..."
"Maybe it's an impostor Rance or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う〜、私にもサッパリなんです〜」
ランスの過保護はその後しばらく続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's overprotectiveness continued for a while thereafter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内の皆を大いに驚かせたという。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: greatly surprising everyone in the castle.
In front of the Supreme Command Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのぉ、中に入らないのですか？」
「えーと、本格的に魔軍に対して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, the day when we officially start counterattacking the demon army... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反撃を開始する日……ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The day we begin the counterattack... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は俺様が華々しく活躍するその初日だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today is the first day I will shine brilliantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初からバシーッと行くのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to strike hard from the very start."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは室内で首輪をつけられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel was collared inside the room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは勝手に死んだお前に対しての罰だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a punishment for you dying on your own accord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、でもこれじゃ、お茶も淹れられないです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, but this way, I can't even make tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、お茶ならビスケッタさんがいるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, if it's tea, Biscetta is here, isn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 代わりと言っては力不足ですが、私が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I may be insufficient as a substitute, but I will..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル様におかれましてはどうかお気になさらず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, Lady Sheel, don't worry about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっか体の調子が悪いのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is some part of your body unwell?
I-I need to go to the bathroom..."
"What if you fall on the way to the bathroom!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転んだらどうする気だ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do if you fall!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさん、介添えでついていってくれ」
さあシィル様。こちらに」
「ら、ランスがシィルちゃんに優しい……
あんなの初めて見たわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen anything like that before..."
"Maybe it's an impostor Rance or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う〜、私にもサッパリなんです〜」
ランスの過保護はその後しばらく続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's overprotectiveness continued for a while thereafter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内の皆を大いに驚かせたという。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: greatly surprising everyone in the castle.
In front of the Supreme Command Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのぉ、中に入らないのですか？」
「えーと、本格的に魔軍に対して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, the day when we officially start counterattacking the demon army... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反撃を開始する日……ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The day we begin the counterattack... right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は俺様が華々しく活躍するその初日だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today is the first day I will shine brilliantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初からバシーッと行くのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to strike hard from the very start."
